description: "Maritime routes had to be adjusted in response to the changing monsoon seasons, as is seen on this late 18th century map of the Indian Ocean. Drawings of the heads of children blowing—called ‘wind-heads’—are used to indicate wind direction."
title: "... Chart... Shewing the Connection and respective distances by Sea, between the principal harbours and Settlements in the East Indies. By... Benjamin Lacam. [In] Complete Pilot for the Northern Part of the Bay of Bengal. Plate V [cartographic material]."
